# Aruba AOS8 Static Boot Example 

write erase all // delete all for boot with new creds again

System name: Aruba7005_BE_F1_B8

Switch Role: standalone

Controller VLAN id: 53

Controller VLAN port: GE 0/0/0

Controller VLAN port mode: trunk

Native VLAN id: 53

Option to configure VLAN interface IPV4 address: yes

VLAN interface IP address: 10.0.X.X

VLAN interface subnet mask: 255.255.255.192

IP Default gateway: 10.0.X.X

Domain Name Server to resolve FQDN: X.X.X.X

Option to configure VLAN interface IPV6 address: no

Country code: TR

IANA Time Zone: Europe/Istanbul
